Description: Metadata that describes details related to the assay and/or protocol used to generate the data
Metadata that describes the biospecimen (aka samples) used to generate the data
A table that defines the fields, values, and rules for another metadata file.
A document detail procedures used that contributed to the generation of data.
An example document conforming to a specified format.
A vendor-created document outlining details for performing procedures, using equipment, etc.
